isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: HOLSET SS 296 AND QE 296/338 - MAINTENANCE

svcsubsecinfo.para: There are two levels of service covered in this manual: the Maintenance Level and the Service Level. The Maintenance Level covers service which needs to be done at regular intervals to ensure extended life or to correct minor problems, and the Service Level covers service which is necessary due to more serious malfunctions.
Compare your air compressor problems to those outlined in TROUBLESHOOTING. The Troubleshooting Chart will direct you to more detailed repair information.

note.para: Maintenance and Service Kits are available for field work above the crankcase. For repair work below the valve body gasket, contact your International Dealer Parts Department.

svcproc.title: SS 296 COMPRESSOR
svcproc.para: There are two Maintenance Kits and one Service Kit for the single cylinder with 3-leg unloader cap compressors as follows:

item.para: Unloader Seal Maintenance Kit ( Figure 6). The unloader body bolts, unloader body and unloader cap are not included in this kit; they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in this kit, liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap, unloader vee seal and unloader body cavity. The Unloader Seal Kit is also included in both of the following kits ( Figure 7and Figure 8).

Conventional Models With 3-Leg Unloader Cap Maintenance Kit ( Figure 7). The unloader body bolts, head bolts, unloader body, unloader cap, intake seat, exhaust seat, cover and head are not included in this kit; they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in this kit, liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap and unloader vee seal.

Conventional Models With Direct/Remote Air Governor Mounting Service Kit ( Figure 8). The unloader body bolts, head bolts, cover and head are not included in this kit: they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in this kit, liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap and unloader vee seal.

figure.caption: Figure 7. Conventional Models With 3-Leg Unloader Cap Maintenance Kit
Figure 8. Conventional Models With Direct/Remote Air Governor Mounting Service Kit
